original: Krull, Hans Göte, tandläkare, Göteborg, f. 28/8/09 i Kallinge, Blek. 1., av folksk:lår. Karl K. o. Ida Wilhelmina Ekelin. G. 37 m. Gunborg Winther. Barn: Ingela f. 39. — Stud:-ex. i Karlskrona 29, med. istud. v. Lunds univ. 30-31, tandhkand. 32, tandl. 34. Prakt, i Töcksfors 35-38, i Gbg sed. 38, skoltandl. i Töcksfors, Östervallskog o. Holmedal 35-38. Hobbies: fiske o. motorsport. Kruuse af Verchou, Carl-Olof Alvar, friherre, ingenjör, Romaklo’Ster, f. 9/9/16 i Burlöv, Malmöh. 1., av frih. Carl-Fredrik K. af V. o. Jensine Mår-tenssen. G. 38 m. Stina Persson. Barn: Gunila f. 42, Carl-Johan 43, Ulla-Christina 45, Birgitta Agneta 46, — Realsk. 33, tekn. facksk. 35, utbildn. t. chefsmek. v. flygkrigssk. å Ljungby-hed 36-38, praktik v. Sv. Sockerfabr. A-B i Ariöv, statens brandsk. 46. För-isälj. f. firma G. Rössel i Malmö 39, beredsk:tjg. 40, arbetsled. v. Öresunds-varvet i Landskrona 41-42, tj :man v. Sv. Sockerfabr. A-B sed. 43. Brand-chef inom Björke kommun, Gotl. 1., sed. 46. Hobby: jakt. Kruuse af Vercliou, Kurt ViTfielm, friherre, ingenjör, Linköping, f. 23/1/ 14 i Svenljunga, Älvsb. 1., av frih. Gustaf K. af V. o. Ebba Lindqvist. G. 39 m. Vendela Hedlund. Barn: Dag f. 42, Magnus 45. — Utex. fr. Borås tekn. gymn. 3i3. Anst. v. Strömisfors Bruk 34-36, Sv. Yil;k,konc. i Tidan 36-41, Sv. Aeroplan A-B i Linköp. sed. 41. Ordf. i Tidans avd. av Sv. ind:-tj .-mannaförb. samt styr:led. i Skövde landst :fören. 38-41, styr rled. i Linköp. friv. befälsutbiidn :fören. sed. 45. Hobbies: jakt o. friluftsliv. Linköp. försv :omr. befäl’sutbiild’n :förb. SM. Krüger, Ernst Axel, godsägare, Fredriksdal, f. 12/2/06 i Gbg av arkit. Ernst K. o. Harriet Pineus. G. 31 m. Greta Littorin. Barn: Ann-Marie f. 32, Mcnica 3’3, Brigitta 36, Krister 42. — Filip Holmqvists hand :inst. i Gbg 23. Res. t. Engl. 22, 23, Tyskl. 26-27, Frankr. 28, Ital. 35, Ung., Rumän. 27, i Afrika 27-28, Amerika 29, 36, 40, 45, Japan 29, Kina 29, Ryssk 29, Portugal, Span. 40, Jugoslav. 30, Norge 33, Danm., Holk, Belg. 30. Anst. h. För-säkr. A-B Ocean i Gbg 24-25. Fr. 39 verkst. dir. i egna föret. Cautio A-B, Föty, A-B Fido, Abo A-B, Kem. Tvätt, Sthlm. Hobbies: jakt, segling. Krüger, Harry Ludvig, direktör, Göteborg, f. 15/6/93 i Särö, Hall. 1., av arkit. E. O. K. o. Harriet Pineus. G. m. Helen Lyon. Barn: Ingela f. 30, Gunilla 32. — Stud. v. Gbgs hand:-inst. o. Gbgs högsk. samt språkstud. i uti. Anst. v, SKF i Gbg 15, SKF i Ryssl. 16-18, egen aff :verksamh. i New York 19-22, anst. v. banker o. ind. i Tyskl. 22-26, Wockatz & Co. A-B i Gbg fr. 26, verkst. dir. där 31-45, verkst. dir. i Hand:firman Harry L. Krüger i Gbg. Led. av istyr. f. Carpentry Patent A-B i Gbg o. fören. Föreningsgatan 6 i Gbg, v. ordf. i Sv. råvarugrossistfören. 39-45, rev. i Sv. Ostronkomp., Fastigh. A-B Avenyen, Gbgs ’konstfören., v. ordf. i styr. f. Gbgs ålderd:hem, ordf. i sällsk. Särö vänner, medl. av KAK, KSAK, GKSS, Konstmusei vänner, Röbsska mus. vänner, Bachelors Club, Gbgs gymn:-sällsk. o. Skidfrämj.
translated:
Krull, Hans Göte, dentist, Gothenburg, b. 28/8/09 in Kallinge, Blekinge County, son of primary school teacher Karl K. and Ida Wilhelmina Ekelin. Married in 1937 to Gunborg Winther. Children: Ingela b. 1939. Studied in Karlskrona, received medical education at Lund University from 1930-1931, obtained dental degree in 1932, became a dentist in 1934. Practiced in Töcksfors from 1935-1938, and in Gothenburg from 1938 onwards. Was a school dentist in Töcksfors, Östervallskog, and Holmedal from 1935-1938. Hobbies: fishing and motorsport.

Kruuse af Verchou, Carl-Olof Alvar, baron, engineer, Romaklo'Ster, b. 9/9/16 in Burlöv, Malmöhus County, son of baron Carl-Fredrik K. af V. and Jensine Mår-tenssen. Married in 1938 to Stina Persson. Children: Gunila b. 1942, Carl-Johan b. 1943, Ulla-Christina b. 1945, Birgitta Agneta b. 1946. Completed secondary school in 1933, technical trade school in 1935, received mechanical engineering training at the Air Force War School in Ljungbyhed from 1936-1938, had practical training at Swedish Sugar Factory AB in Ariöv, and served in the state fire brigade in 1946. Worked for G. Rössel firm in Malmö in 1939, served in the military reserve in 1940, became a supervisor at Öresund Shipyard in Landskrona from 1941-1942, and a manager at Swedish Sugar Factory AB from 1943 onwards. Became the fire chief in Björke municipality, Gotland County, in 1946. Hobby: hunting.

Kruuse af Vercliou, Kurt Vilhelm, baron, engineer, Linköping, b. 23/1/14 in Svenljunga, Älvsborg County, son of baron Gustaf K. af V. and Ebba Lindqvist. Married in 1939 to Vendela Hedlund. Children: Dag b. 1942, Magnus b. 1945. Graduated from Borås Technical Gymnasium in 1933. Worked for Strömisfors Bruk from 1934-1936, Swedish Vacuum Cleaners in Tidan from 1936-1941, and Swedish Aeroplan AB in Linköping from 1941 onwards. Served as chairman of the Tidan branch of the Swedish Industrial Union and board member of Skövde County Association from 1938-1941, and board member of Linköping Volunteer Officer Training Association from 1945 onwards. Hobbies: hunting and outdoor activities. Member of the Linköping defense area officer's training association.

Krüger, Ernst Axel, landowner, Fredriksdal, b. 12/2/06 in Gothenburg, son of architect Ernst K. and Harriet Pineus. Married in 1931 to Greta Littorin. Children: Ann-Marie b. 1932, Monica b. 1933, Brigitta b. 1936, Krister b. 1942. Attended Filip Holmqvist's hand institute in Gothenburg in 1923. Traveled to England in 1922 and 1923, Germany in 1926-1927, France in 1928, Italy in 1935, Africa in 1927-1928, America in 1929, 1936, 1940, and 1945, Japan in 1929, China in 1929, Russia in 1928, Portugal and Spain in 1940, Yugoslavia in 1930, Norway in 1933, and Denmark, Holland, Belgium in 1930. Worked at Ocean Insurance AB in Gothenburg from 1924-1925. Since 1939, he has been the managing director of his own companies: Cautio AB, Föty AB, Abo AB, Kem. Tvätt AB in Stockholm. Hobbies: hunting and sailing.

Krüger, Harry Ludvig, director, Gothenburg, b. 15/6/93 in Särö, Halland County, son of architect E. O. K. and Harriet Pineus. Married to Helen Lyon. Children: Ingela b. 1930, Gunilla b. 1932. Studied at Gothenburg's Handelsinstitut and Gothenburg University, and studied languages abroad. Employed at SKF in Gothenburg from 1915, SKF in Russia from 1916-1918, had his own business in New York from 1919-1922, worked for banks and industry in Germany from 1922-1926, and at Wockatz & Co. AB in Gothenburg from 1926 onwards, where he became the managing director in 1931. He is a board member of Carpentry Patent AB in Gothenburg and Föreningsgatan 6 in Gothenburg, vice chairman of the Swedish Raw Materials Wholesalers Association from 1939-1945, auditor at the Swedish Oyster Company, Fastighets AB Avenyen, Gothenburg Art Society, chairman of the board for Gothenburg's Elderly Home, and chairman of the Särö Friends Society. He is a member of several clubs and associations.
